name: Turtle Adventure (Hari Jeung)
description:
YOU ARE A TURTLE!! Not just any turtle.... a turtle with a RIP OFF CHEETO BAG!!!

Explore you're environment and see how different things interact with you when You enter their area. A simple yet cute interactive 2D/3D unity game.

CREDIT:
  • Hari Jeung - 2D art, scripting, cutscene animation
  • freesound.org - music/SFX
